creator: naturerobert@gmail.com
text:
Jmeter freezes when attempted to upload image from iphone application for performance testing via proxy ? after around 15 minutes it takes the upload request and freezes again

 FYI : iphone Application i have been trying to test has image and video upload feature.

Did tried with keeping the images in the JMETER_HOME/bin  but still the issue is persistent 
number of user : 1
Ramp Up Period : 1
Loop Count : 1

 Device used : iphone 5s, Version : 9.3.1
  Mac os x el capiton
  processor   : 2.5 GHZ intel core i5
  Memory : 8 GB

creator: naturerobert@gmail.com
text: Recently did installed ApacheJMeterTemporaryRootCA.crt to iphone i am using but even doing that , Jmeter is still freezing when trying to upload images via iphone application using proxy

creator: felix.schumacher@internetallee.de
text:
Can you try to get a threaddump from jmeter when you think it is frozen?

And I have not really understood, what you are trying to do. Are you using an iphone together with jmeters https script recorder to record an application that is installed on the iphone?

Closing as we didn't get any feedback.
@reporter, feel free to reopen with required elements.
creator: p.mouawad@ubik-ingenierie.com
